name: Inner Drive
description:
Trying to keep the player's psychology alive. Need to feed the player's adrenaline, ego, hunger and car's gas. 

Input:Right and left arrow to accelarate and slow down. Up and down arrow to change lanes. Car always stop at the middle of the screen. Try to catch the places at the middle.

Need to go faster, change lanes and go date to gain adrenaline. Need to go date to gain ego. Need to go restaurant to decrease hunger. Need to go gas station for gas obviously. Nothing to do to age. When gets old enough game ends naturally. It is the win ending
